name: Dummy
title: Dummy
text: Can not delete last object of it's kind!

name: Stats
title: Stats
text: HP/LCK: 20{br}All Others: 10{br}All Units have MOV Growths!

name: Equations
title: Equations
text: Hit: SKL*20 + LCK*5{br}Avo: SPD*5 + LCK*5{br}Crit Avo: LCK*10{br}Doubling Threshold: 1 SPD{br}Crit Damage: x2{br}Effectiveness: x3

name: Wep. Ranks
title: Weapon Ranks
text: Weapons don't require weapon ranks. Instead, characters gain Hit at rank A and S:{br}A: +10 Hit{br}S: +20 Hit

name: Burning
title: Burning
text: Saraid's Firestarter lights tiles on fire!{br}The fire spreads next turn to adjacent tiles.{br}Units starting their turn on a burning tile take 4 damage.{br}Also, they suffer -1 SKL/SPD/DEF/RES.

name: Free Actions
title: Free Actions
text: Any item or ability with green text doesn't end a player unit's turn!

name: Bolster
title: Bolster
text: Corridon's Bolster ability gives an ally temporary HP for 2 turns.{br}At the end of the effect their Max HP reduces to its original value.
